subject: Simsonn Plus X Racing pedals
description_text:
Good evening,

I have recently purchased a set of the plus x racing pedals and the brake
pedal appears to not be working fully as intended,  if apply a little
amount of pressure it maxes out but as soon as i exert any further pressure
it starts jumping from 0-100, i have recalibrated the pedal numerous times
and it appears to make no difference, please could you advise on what we
can do to rectify this issue

Many thanks
Freddie Marlow

conversations.body_text: Hi Freddie Marlow,    Please update SIMSONN Manager to v2.1.2 in the settings, and then perform the firmware update. After the update, the firmware versions should be: CPU1: 2.0.5  CPU2: 2.0.4  Next, click “Offset Zero” to clear the white signal offset of the pedals, and then redo the pedal calibration and testing.
